amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funding for the deployment of U.S. ground forces in the Republic of Bosnia and Herzegovina after June 30, 1998 or such date as Congress determines; prohibits funding for law enforcement activities in Bosnia and Herzegovina after enactment; and requires the President to report to Congress on political and military conditions in Bosnia and Herzegovina not later than December 15, 1997.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any funds authorized in the bill to be obligated for the deployment of U.S. ground troops in Bosnia after June 30, 1998, except to support a limited number of U.S. military personnel sufficient to protect U.S. diplomatic facilities and noncombat military personnel serving in an advisory capacity to NATO commanders of peacekeeping operations in Bosnia and Herzegovina.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buyer amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 278 - 148 (Roll no. 234).
